sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container style="height: 100vh ">


    <el-container>
<!--            style="background-color:#002339;padding: 0 10px ;"-->
      <el-header  style="background-color:#002339;padding: 0 10px ;">
        <Header :collapse-btn-class="collapseBtnClass" :collapse="collapse"/>
      </el-header>
        <router-view/>
    </el-container>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>

import Header from "@/components/Header";


export default {
  components: {Header},
  data() {
    return {
      collapseBtnClass: 'el-icon-s-fold',
      isCollapsed:false,
      sideWidth:150,
      logoTextShow:true,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    collapse() {
      //点击收缩触发函数
      this.isCollapsed = !this.isCollapsed
      if (this.isCollapsed) {
        this.sideWidth = 64
        this.collapseBtnClass = 'el-icon-s-unfold'
        this.logoTextShow = false
      } else {
        this.logoTextShow = true
        this.sideWidth = 150
        this.collapseBtnClass = 'el-icon-s-fold'
      }
    },
  }
}
</script>
<style>

.el-header {
  display:flex;
  /*line-height: 60px;*/
}

.el-aside {
  color: #333;
  overflow: hidden;
}
</style>
